abstract: Patrick J. Foye's appointment comes as the governor seeks a significant expansion of the authority's portfolio.
snippet: Patrick J. Foye's appointment comes as the governor seeks a significant expansion of the authority's portfolio.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey

lead_paragraph: 9:15 p.m. | Updated Patrick J. Foye, a veteran of economic development circles and a well-known figure in Long Island's public life, was nominated on Wednesday by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo to become the next executive director of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey.

headline.main: Cuomo Names a Deputy to Lead the Port Authority
